snippet: Chen Guangcheng, the blind Chinese activist whose daring escape began an odyssey that brought him to New York University, expressed optimism Thursday about the future of legal rights in China.
abstract: Chen Guangcheng, the blind Chinese activist whose daring escape from his village began an odyssey that brought him to the United States, gives speech at New York University expressing optimism about the future of legal rights in China.
lead_paragraph: Chen Guangcheng, the blind Chinese activist whose daring escape began an odyssey that brought him to New York University, expressed optimism Thursday about the future of legal rights in China.

headline.seo: Chinese Dissident Voices Optimism About His Nation’s Future

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
